import React, { useState } from "react"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import logo from "./assets/logo.png"; import successImage from "./assets/success.png"; import qr from "./assets/qr.png"; const plans = [ { title: "Single Talk Session", duration: "35 minutes", validity: "1 Day", sessions: "1 session", price: "₹99", }, { title: "One Deep Session", duration: "60 minutes", validity: "1 Day", sessions: "1 session", price: "₹149", }, { title: "Monthly VIP Plan (Short)", duration: "30 min × 6 sessions", validity: "30 Days", sessions: "Weekly support + 2 extras", price: "₹700", }, { title: "Monthly VIP Plan (Full)", duration: "60 min × 7 sessions", validity: "30 Days", sessions: "Intensive full recovery plan", price: "₹1500", }, ]; const FadeIn = ({ children }) => ( {children} ); function App() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", image: null }); const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.send( "service_ted5m2h", "template_5qmfosa", { name: formData.name, email: formData.email }, "D8Cr-U9g1MVqsc5bv" ).then(() => console.log("User notified")); emailjs.send( "service_ted5m2h", "template_nzvxr9o", { name: formData.name, email: formData.email }, "D8Cr-U9g1MVqsc5bv" ).then(() => console.log("Admin alerted")); setSubmitted(true); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Ghar-ki-Baat

When no one listens, we do.

{/* Hero */}

Ghar-ki-Baat

A space for real talk — more than advice, lighter than therapy.

{/* What We Do */}

What We Do

• Listen to anything on your mind — stress, career confusion, relationships, dilemmas, or silence.

• Make you feel lighter with calm, honest conversations.

• Offer simple guidance or just space to breathe — no pressure.

{/* Plans */}

Our Plans

{plans.map((p, i) => (

{p.title}

⏱ {p.duration}

📅 {p.validity}

📍 {p.sessions}

{p.price}

 ))}
{/* Why Trust Us */}
🛡 100% Privacy
👂 Compassionate Listeners
💬 Real Talk
 {/* Booking */}

Book a Session

{!submitted ? (
setFormData({ ...formData, name: e.target.value })} /> setFormData({ ...formData, email: e.target.value })} /> setFormData({ ...formData, image: e.target.files[0] })} />
) : (

Form submitted!

)}

Scan to Pay

 {/* Testimonials */}

What Our Users Say

“I felt truly heard for the first time in months. Thank you.” – A****a K***r
“It was like a weight lifted off my shoulders after just one call.” – R****h S***n
“No judgment. No pressure. Just someone who actually listened.” – R**i S****a
{/* FAQs */}

FAQs

{[ { q: "Is my conversation private?", a: "Yes. We maintain strict confidentiality of all sessions." }, { q: "Do I need to reveal my identity?", a: "No, you can choose to stay anonymous if you prefer." }, { q: "What if I need help urgently?", a: "You can contact us via WhatsApp or email anytime, and we’ll prioritize your request." } ].map((item, idx) => (
{item.q}

{item.a}

))}
{/* CTA */}

Need Help or Custom Support?

We’re here to listen. Reach out anytime.

Email Us WhatsApp
{/* Footer */}

© {new Date().getFullYear()} Ghar‑ki‑Baat. All rights reserved.

); } export default App;
